means: 造成困苦与苦难的原因

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都表示"困难"之意。
means: difficulty ： 指需大量思考和技巧或努力才能克服的任何困难。
hardship ： 侧重指生活上令人难以承受的艰难困苦，如疾病、贫穷等磨难。

sentence.Network_en: Many people are suffering economic hardship.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多人正处于经济困难之中。

sentence.Network_en: Housing benefit provides a cushion against hardship.
sentence.Network_cn: 住房福利可以减轻人们生活的艰辛。

sentence.Network_en: Hardship and penury wore him out before his time.
sentence.Network_cn: 受穷受苦使他未老先衰.

entry.def: Hardship is a situation in which your life is difficult or unpleasant, often because you do not have enough money.

example.ex: Many people are suffering economic hardship...
example.tran: 很多人正处于经济困难之中。

example.ex: One of the worst hardships is having so little time to spend with one's family.
example.tran: 最大的痛苦之一是几乎没有时间和家人在一起。

means.word_mean: 1. a state of misfortune or affliction;
3. something that causes or entails suffering;

sentences.sentence: "I cannot think it a hardship that more indulgence is allowed to men than to women"- James Boswell

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's a lot of hardship in that society.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词,表示"某种技能"; 2. 表名词,表示"某种关系,状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: airman飞行员,空军+ship某种技能→n.飞行术,导航技术
horseman养马的人,骑师,马兵+ship某种技能→n.马术

stems_affixes.value_cn: 推销术,说服力,销售,推销
stems_affixes.word_buile: salsman推销员+ship某种技能→n.推销术,说服力,销售,推销
champion冠军+ship某种关系,状态→n.锦标赛;冠军赛

stems_affixes.value_cn: 市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
stems_affixes.word_buile: citizen公民+ship某种关系,状态→n.市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
dictator专政者+ship某种关系,状态→n.独裁[权];专政
friend朋友+ship某种关系,状态→n.友谊,友好
hard艰难的+ship某种关系,状态→n.艰难,困苦
member成员+ship某种关系,状态→n.会员资格,成员资格
partner合作者+ship某种关系,状态→n.合伙企业
relation关系,联系+ship某种关系,状态→n.关系,联系

Sentence.sentence: For some, the hardships of life without steady work eventually overwhelmed their attempts to keep their families together.
Few couples can stand the test of economic hardships
What is Andrea's attitude toward the hardships brought by the economic recession?

sentences.en: He was willing to face any hardship in fulfillment of his duty.
sentences.cn: 他愿意面对任何困难去履行他的职责。

sentences.en: My mother suffered all kinds of hardships throughout her life.
sentences.cn: 我母亲一生尝到了各种辛酸。

jushi.english: My mother suffered all kinds of hardships throughout her life.
jushi.chinese: 我母亲一生尝到了各种辛酸。

jushi.english: He was willing to face any hardship in fulfillment of his duty.
jushi.chinese: 他愿意面对任何困难去履行他的职责。

jushi.english: To finish the task by himself will be a great hardship.
jushi.chinese: 要他独立完成这项任务将是很艰难的。
